AccessControlBadConfirmation().details: The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}.

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

InsufficientQuantity(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the requested quantity exceeds available inventory.The quantity that was requested.The quantity that was available.

InvalidCaller().details: Emitted when the caller is invalid

NotAllowed().details: Emitted when an operation is not allowed for the caller

NotEnoughTokensInListings(uint256,uint25.details: Emitted when the requested number of tokens to buy cannot be fulfilled by the available listings.The total amount of tokens requestedThe amount of tokens actually found in listings

ParamError().details: Emitted when a function parameter is invalid or out-of-range (e.g. zero batchSize, zero price, etc.)

PurchaseError().details: Emitted when a purchase cannot proceed (e.g. buyer not whitelisted, amount exceeds max buy, not enough tokens).

ReleaseNotFound(uint256).details: Emitted when a release is not found in the manager (e.g. gildiManager.releaseExists(...) fails).The ID that could not be found.

ReleaseStateError(uint256).details: Emitted when a release is in a wrong state (e.g. uninitialized, cancelling when it should not be, or active/inactive mismatch).The ID of the release in question.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

SetupError().details: Emitted when there is a setup/configuration issue (e.g. oracle decimals not set, invalid fee distribution).

params.assetPrices: The prices of the asset for the quantity bracket
params.duration: The duration of the initial sale
params.maxBuy: The maximum amount of tokens a buyer can buy in the initial sale
params.saleCurrency: The currency of the initial sale
params.saleFees: The fees for the initial sale
params.startTime: The start time of the initial sale
params.whitelistDuration: The duration the whitelist is enforced
params.whitelistEnabled: If the initial sale is a whitelist sale

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

params.priceInUSD: The price per item in USD
params.quantity: The quantity of the release being purchased
params.releaseId: The ID of the release being purchased
The ID of the release being cancelled
The ID of the release being cancelled

RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32.details: Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this.

RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}.

RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address).details: Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

canBuy(uint256,address).details: Considers whitelist status, initial sale status, and transaction limits

returns.buyAllowed: True if the user can buy the release, false otherwise
returns.maxBuyAmount: The maximum amount the user can buy (0 if not allowed)

returns._0: result An array containing whether or not each release can be sold

params._params: The parameters for creating the initial sale

params._fundsReceiver: The address to receive funds from the sale (if address(0), defaults to seller)
params._payoutCurrency: The currency the seller wants to receive payment in
params._pricePerItem: The price per item in USD

returns._0: The address of the active marketplace asset for the release
An array of fee distributions for the release

params._activeOnly: Whether or not to only return active releases

returns._0: activeReleases An array of release IDs

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns._0: whitelist The whitelist of the release

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._gildiManager: The address of the Gildi Manager
params._initialAdmin: The address of the initial admin
params._initialDefaultAdmin: The address of the initial default admin
params._initialMarketplaceManager: The address of the initial marketplace manager
params._marketplaceCurrency: The address of the marketplace currency

returns._0: True if the release is in active initial sale, false otherwise

params._fundsReceiver: The address to receive funds from the sale (if address(0), defaults to seller)
params._listingId: The ID of the listing to modify
params._newPricePerItem: The new price per item in USD
params._newQuantity: The new quantity (if 0, the listing will be removed)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to purchase
params._beneficiary: The address to send the tokens to
params._isProxyOperation: Whether the operation is a proxy operation
params._maxTotalPrice: The maximum total price to spend in Marketplace Currency

returns.amountSpent: The amount of Marketplace Currency spent

params._priceInUsd: The price in USD to convert

returns.activeMarketplaceReleaseAsset: The address of the active marketplace asset for the release
returns.priceInAsset: The equivalent amount in the active marketplace asset

params._amountToBuy: The amount of tokens to buy

returns._0: The total cost in marketplace currency
returns._1: The asset the price is in
returns._2: The total price in USD (using exchange's priceAskDecimals)

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params._askDecimals: The number of decimals for price asks (max 8)

params._marketplaceCurrency: The address of the marketplace currency

params._maxBuyPerTransaction: The maximum buy per transaction (0 = unlimited)

params._additionalFees: The additional fees for the release

params._askDecimals: The number of decimals for price asks
params._fundManager: The fund manager contract for handling funds
params._gildiPriceOracle: The price oracle for currency conversions
params._orderBook: The order book contract for managing listings
params._paymentAggregator: The payment aggregator for handling payments

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

params._releaseId: The ID of the release (0 = all)

AskDecimalsSet(uint8).notice: Emitted when the ask decimals are set

FeesUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when a release's fees are updated

InitialSaleCreated(uint256,address,uint2.notice: Emitted when an initial sale is created

InitialSaleEnded(uint256).notice: Emitted when the initial sale ends

MarketplaceCurrencySet(address).notice: Emitted when the marketplace currency is set

Purchased(uint256,address,address,addres.notice: Emitted when a purchase is made

ReleaseActiveStateChanged(uint256,bool).notice: Emitted when a release's active state is changed

ReleaseCancellationStarted(uint256).notice: Emitted when a release cancellation is started

ReleaseCancelled(uint256).notice: Emitted when a release is fully cancelled

ReleaseInitialized(uint256).notice: Emitted when a release is initialized

DEFAULT_SLIPPAGE_BPS().notice: Default slippage tolerance in basis points (1%)

canBuy(uint256,address).notice: Checks if a user can buy a release and determines the maximum amount they can buy

canSell(uint256[]).notice: Checks whether or not a list of releases can be sold.

createListing(uint256,address,uint256,ui.notice: Creates a listing with default slippage

getActiveMarketplaceReleaseAsset(uint256.notice: Gets the active marketplace asset for a release

getInitialSaleByReleaseId(uint256).notice: Gets the initial sale by release ID

getReleaseFees(uint256).notice: Get the fees of a specific release

getReleaseIds(bool).notice: Get a list of release IDs

getWhitelist(uint256).notice: Gets the whitelist of a release.

isInInitialSale(uint256).notice: Checks if a release is currently in its initial sale period

isInitialSaleWhitelistBuyer(uint256,addr.notice: Mapping from release ID to buyer address to whitelist status

isWhitelistSale(uint256).notice: Whether or not the release is in a whitelist sale state

modifyListing(uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Modifies a listing with default slippage

quotePrice(uint256,uint256).notice: Converts a price in USD to the equivalent amount in the release's active marketplace asset

quotePricePreview(uint256,uint256,addres.notice: Gets the price needed to pay in marketplace currency to buy `_amountToBuy` units of `_releaseId`.

releases(uint256).notice: Mapping from release ID to Release struct

setAskDecimals(uint8).notice: Sets the number of decimals for price asks

setMaxBuyPerTransaction(uint256).notice: Sets the max buy per transaction

setReleaseActive(uint256,bool).notice: Sets the active state of a release

setReleaseFees(uint256,((address,address.notice: Sets the fees for a specific release

setup(address,uint8,address,address,addr.notice: Sets up the exchange with required dependencies

transferTokenInContext(address,address,u.notice: Transfer a token in the context of the Gildi Exchange

tryBurnTokenInContext(address,uint256,ad.notice: Tries to burn a token in the context of the Gildi Exchange

unlistAllListings(uint256,uint256).notice: Unlists all listings of a release in batches.
